name: InitializeModelStoreAX2012
friendlyName: Initialize the Schema of an AX 2012 Model store
description: Does initialize the Schema of an AX 2012 Model store
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the server configuration file.

inputs.name: schemaName
inputs.label: Schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies a schema name to create a model store in. If this parameter is not specified, the dbo schema is used. (optional)

inputs.name: aosAccount
inputs.label: AOS Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Grants permissions to the model store in the Microsoft Dynamics AX database to the account that an Application Object Server instance is running as. The account is granted EXECUTE rights for the appropriate stored procedures, and SELECT rights for the appropriate views. Use this account primarily when moving a model store to a new environment. (optional)

inputs.name: createDB
inputs.label: Create a new model database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should a new database be created? (optional)

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - Initialize the Schema of an AX 2012 Model store: $(schemaName)
